titleStmt.title: July 18. 1642. A perfect diurnall of all the proceedings of the English and Scotch armies in Ireland, from the 14 of June to this present. Sent over from Master Godwin, Master of the Ordnance in the English army, to a merchant now dwelling in London.
titleStmt.author: Godwin, Master.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
